sentences.cn: 老年学突然变得受欢迎了。

sentences.en: It caters for the patients of gerontology and provides them with high - level and high - quality services.
sentences.cn: 面向广大老年病患者提供高水平优质服务.

sentences.en: The logo must be creative and visualize the keywords: regeneration, medicine, gerontology.
sentences.cn: 该标志必须有创意和想象的关键字: 再生, 医学, 老年医学.

words.tran_cn: [医][内科]老年医学；老年病学；老人学

trans.tran_en: the scientific study of old age and its effects on the body
